Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VoltageRailId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VoltageRailName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CurrentVoltageMv" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MaxVoltageMv" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PlatformStateDependencyCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="PlatformStateDependency" count="PlatformStateDependencyCount"> <data name="PlatformState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VoltageRailId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ComponentIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CurrentFrequencyKHz" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MaxFrequencyKHz" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PlatformStateDependencyCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="PlatformStateDependency" count="PlatformStateDependencyCount"> <data name="PlatformState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> <data name="ComponentDescriptionLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ComponentDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ComponentDescriptionLength"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VoltageRailId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldRailVoltageMv" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewRailVoltageMv" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ComponentIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldComponentFrequencyKHz" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewComponentFrequencyKHz" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PlatformStateCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="PlatformIdleStateResidency" count="PlatformStateCount"> <data name="PlatformState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Duration" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OldPlatformState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewPlatformState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
